remarks: Equivalence for a pair equal to a singleton, deduction form. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Dec-2016.)
statement:
preqsnd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. _V ) $.
preqsnd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. _V ) $.
preqsnd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. _V ) $.
preqsnd $p |- ( ph -> ( { A , B } = { C } <-> ( A = C /\ B = C ) ) ) $.
